snippet.title: Threads of You: Beyond the Bay (Visual Novel) || DEMO TRAILER
snippet.description:
Threads of You: Beyond the Bay is a visual novel of love, friendship and life that invites you to explore seven different routes, each offering a unique outcome on the story. With over 14 possible endings, the story and fates of 7 potential love interests shift based on the decisions you make. Create your own main character with various customisable options, tailor the tale to your liking, and immerse yourself in the sun-soaked town of Brine Bay.

DEMO COMING EARLY FEBRUARY 2024!
___________________________________________________
🌸 MUSIC:
【off vocal】ヒロインは平均以下。／HoneyWorks【公式】► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lO43sFs7Mpw&ab_channel=HoneyWorks2ndChannel
___________________________________________________
